reviewText: Weird show..

Sid the Science Kid are all great educational movies that really do teach your kids educational programing in simple ways.  My daughter always learns so much from these and she's 2!  She sings the songs and learns the lesson they are teaching and will act out what she learns in pretend play.  I love these movies and I think anyone looking for a great way to teach educational concepts to young children in an entertaining way should consider these movies.

Actually, my children and I love this TV program. That's why we were so disappointed that the rental vanished from our watchlist so quickly. This is especially frustrating, as it is extremely challenging to locate a "rental period" anywhere on the page where you actually click "rent." Rental Periods should be more clearly displayed on the page where the item is described.
My 3 year old loves Sid and watches this show over and over again.  She goes around singing the rainbow song and thus knows the colors of the rainbow.
Such a good show. Every episode of Sid the Science Kid is very educational and a good influence on kids
My son loved this, he laughed so hard multiple times, repeated some if the silly jokes and learned about rainbows!

From a mom's perspective Sid the Science Kid is one of my favorite educational shows for children. He makes difficult concepts simple in the eyes of a child. We live in Hawaii, the Rainbow State, so it was fun for my daughter to learn more about why the skies of our sunny state with it's frequent rain bursts is so full of rainbows.

We own several Sid DVDs and this one was a great addition to the bunch.  They are grouped into related topics & build off each other quite nicely.  My daughter loves these shows & has learned so much from them.  I couldn't find this DVD locally so I was happy to see it offered on Amazon.
My 2 year old loves this episode! She knows all the colors of the rainbow, sings the songs, and is very attentive when this specific episode is on. Must get this DVD!

Great episodes!  Our son loves this. I wish the product description on Amazon listed the episodes on this though. (5 stars for the product, 2 stars for the product description here on Amazon)
They are...
Let There Be Light
Discovering Darkness
Shadow Smile
A Rainbow Every Day!
My son love side the science kid
My kids LOVE Sid. He is one of their favorite cartoons to watch! Im all for it of course because it also teaches them things in the process!
One my son's favorites.  He asks about rainbows and the various colors all the time.  This video has been perfect to help him learn all about rainbows.
My great granddaughter loves SID
My 3 yr old granddaughter loves this series and I like the way the information is presented.
Just plain awesome!
Perfect program for science oriented kids! (age 5 year old)
great video
Super as usual.  My grandchildren watched it over and over again. Love this series and the kids learn so much. Would recommend for children to twelve and as young as three.

I am a Kindergarten teacher and just recently found out about Sid the Science Kid. Where have I been? The first episode I watched was the whale episode that discusses non standard measurement. Wow...perfect for classroom use! I love how with each episode, it gives the children (and adults) an easy way to experiment that episode's concept. The concepts are explained in detail on an appropriate level. The DVD itself came in great condition. Great series to introduce your child to scientific thinking!!!
The video was what our son wanted to add to his Sid the Science Kid DVD collection. He loves it and learns from each video.
My 5 year old loves this show.  He said, "It helps me learn, Mom."
was very helpful for helping teach my pre-k kids about rainbows. they love this program
It's not a movie, which is why I gave it only 4 stars, but 4 Sid episodes- still, nice to have them all together! I love Sid the Science Kid.
My son is obsessed with sid and it was in great condition
great for first grade
My special needs son is hooked on Sid and he mimics them talking.  Great learning tapes.
Kids love this!!

As a mom, grandmother and child care provider, I love Sid The Science Kid. We have been learning about rainbows on Sabbath and then with the daycare throughout the week. The rainbow episode is the reason that I bought this movie but we love Sid and its always a nice touch to add a educational movie to our theme. They have watched this many times and they all love it. I love that Sid loves to learn, he makes science fun. He also loves his family.
